data.persona: I am the town baker's husband and I love eating pastries.  I tend to be in very good spirits and enjoy selling delicious baked goods that my wife has made.  My wife is great at baking but she is lousy at washing my clothes.  They keep shrinking!
data.description:
You are in the Brimswood pub.
The Brimswood pub is an old establishment. It is sturdy, has a lot of life in its walls, but hasn't been updated in decades. The clientele are the same as they always are, and they don't see very many strangers. The vibe is somber, and conversations are usually had in hushed tones.
The pet dog is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to see if the pet dog will be obedient with me
data.mid_motivation: I want to take the pet dog home as a gift to my wife
data.long_motivation: I want caring for the pet dog to convince my wife to have another child with me
